1.0.0-1:
First beta for tvOS.

- Videos tab with TV topics, trending, events.
- Livestreams tab with TV and radio live channels.
- Shows tab with main TV shows.
1.0.0-2:
- Current program display on the livestreams tab.
- Playback can be resumed.
- Standard page view measurements.
1.0.0-3:
- Updated translations for all BUs.
- Add date information in media view.
- "Resume" button instead of "Watch" button if needed.
- Only one tab for Play SWI.
1.0.0-4:
- Redesigned TV show A-Z page.
- Add most popular videos at the top of topic pages.
- Correctly update play button state when playback can be resumed.
- Improve suggestions displayed for SRF at the top of the homepage.
- Add support for web first video display on the homepage.
- Conform to official page view measurement specifications.
1.0.0-5:
- Basic accessibility.
- More episodes button renamed on the media detail page.
- Remove episode header on the show detail page.
- Correctly update play button state when content playback is completed.
1.0.1-6:
- Fix remote configuration update.
- Fix potential crashes in production builds.
1.1.0-8:
- Add show favorites swimlane.
- Remove NetMetrix measurements.
1.1.0-10:
- Swiss Satellite radio channels have logos.
- The content comes from the TVPLAY vector.
1.1.0-12:
- Update latest favorite episodes swimlane title.
- Crashes are reported to AppCenter without the need for user consent.
1.2.0-13:
- Add Profile tab for user data management.
- Add Later and Resume playback swimlanes to the homepage.
- Add continuous playback with opt-out setting.
- Synchronize Favorites, Later and Resume playback over a maRTS account (Play RTS only).
- Fix frequent crashes occurring when opening a show detail page.
1.2.0-14:
- Improve navigation performance.
- Update translations for all BUs.
- Fix watch later button behavior for related medias on the media detail page.
1.2.0-15: - [RTS] Fix resume playback not correctly working for some content.
1.2.1-16: - Fix potential crashes when empty list are refreshed on home pages.
1.3.0-17:
- Home and topic pages are now editorialized.
- New badges identify content for which alternate audio tracks are available.
1.3.0-18:
- Modernize show detail page.
- Fix incorrect progress information sometimes displayed to the user.
1.3.1-19:
- Restore displayed dates in show pages and home page.
- Fix potential crashes.
1.3.2-20:
- Screens displaying user content (Watch later, history / resume playback, favorites) have been improved.
- Information display on media cells has been improved.
1.3.2-21:
- Add TV show poster images support.
- Shows A-Z displayed in grid and can display the alphabetical index.
- Show favorite detail page displays alphabetical indexes.
1.3.2-22:
- Group favorited shows only when rows are sufficiently filled in detail view.

Technical: scene support added (only one allowed).
1.3.2-23:
- Hero stage appearance for the Videos homepage.
- Modernized player interface on tvOS 15.
- Improved tvOS 15 compatibility.
1.3.3-25: - Restore favorite and subscription buttons in empty show pages.
1.4.0-26:
- Add Top Shelf with popular shows.
- Improve page reolad at the right time.
1.4.0-27: - Fix content updates incorrectly performed when resuming the application.
1.5.0-28:
- A TV guide has been added to the tab bar navigation.
- Remove show title below poster images.
1.5.0-29:
- TV guide layout fixes.
- Advanced settings for test environments.
1.5.1-30:
- Display 3rd party channels in SRF/RTR TV guide.
- Improved program information in TV guide.
- Shows added to the search view.
- Youth protection information for all BUs.
1.5.1-31:
- Fix crash during continuous playback transitions.
- Improve accessiblity labels.
1.5.1-32:
- SRG released libraries.
- All translations are up to date.
1.6.0-33: - Add playback speed support in the player.
1.6.0-35:
- Update Italian, French and German translations for playback speed feature.
- Fix a playback speed measurement.
1.6.1-37: - External TVP channels in TV guide. [RTR, SRF]
1.6.1-38: - Fix TV guide layout issue when displayed in a time zone other than Zurich. [RTR, RTS, SRF]
1.6.1-39: - Use the reduced image size variants between platforms (web, Android, Apple).
1.6.1-40:
- IT, RM, FR and GE translations updated.
- SRG released libraries.
- AppStore release.
1.6.2-43:
- Soon playable content have now the date and time displayed in list.
- Update Radio SRF 3 and Virus channel logo. [SRF]
- Fix search result update after an error occured.
1.6.3-45:
- The search view now presents topics in addition to the most searched shows.
- Home page hero stage and highlights should have a better image framing.
1.6.3-46: - Support informations can be displayed in profile view.
1.6.4-47:
- Fix user interface glitches when navigating from the player to the media detail view.
- Fix page layout on tvOS 16.
1.6.5-49: - Allow to expand text on show page.
1.6.6-51:
- Add live label in TV guide program preview.
- Add sport livestreams in livestreams tab. [RTS, SRF]
1.6.6-52:
- BU or sport livestreams in livestreams tab. [RTR, RTS, SRF]
- Reload page content after a while in background.
